div.p: This Capability Statement defines the expected capabilities of a validated healthcare directory FHIR server conforming to the Validated Healthcare Directory Implementation Guide.

b.title: GET past versions of resources (vread interaction)
GET all set of resources of the type (search interaction)
PUT a new resource version (update interaction)
GET changes to a resource (history interaction on instance)
GET changes for all resources of the type (history interaction on type)

title.value: Validated Healthcare Directory Server Capability Statement

publisher.value: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

name.value: HL7 International - Patient Administration Work Group

description.value: This Capability Statement defines the expected capabilities of a validated healthcare directory FHIR server conforming to the Validated Healthcare Directory Implementation Guide.

copyright.value: Used by permission of HL7 International all rights reserved Creative Commons License

documentation.value: Select Practitioners with a qualification that is valid at the specified location
Select Practitioners with the specified name (A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm)
Select validation information for the specified resource
